content.text: Not much, just hanging out. I just got back from Japan, and I'm still trying to process everything I learned there.
Japan is so amazing! I've always wanted to go. What was your favorite part of the trip?
I think my favorite part was learning about the culture and history. I never realized how much I didn't know about Japan before I went.
That's so cool! I love learning new things about different cultures. What did you learn that was most surprising to you?
I was surprised to learn how much the Japanese culture is based on respect. Everyone is so polite and respectful, even to strangers.
That's really interesting! I've always heard that the Japanese are very polite people.
They are! It's really refreshing to be in a place where everyone is so friendly and respectful.
I'm sure it was a great experience. I'm jealous!
It was! I'm already planning my next trip.
Awesome! I hope you have a great time
